title: BRIEF-Suzhou New Sea Union Telecom to raise up to 1 bln yuan in private placement
text:
BRIEF-Suzhou New Sea Union Telecom to raise up to 1 bln yuan in private placement 
Oct 13 Suzhou New Sea Union Telecom Technology Co Ltd 
* Says plans to raise up to 1.0 billion yuan ($157.69 million) in share private placement to fund projects, repay bank loans and replenish capital 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1QnJToD 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3417 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
